info: The program seeks to help the state government of Mizoram (SGM) to create fiscal space by (i) enhancing tax and nontax revenue measures and rationalizing expenditures; (ii) bringing about service improvements in two key sectors (health and education) in a cost-effective manner; (iii) ensuring better debt management; (iv) reforming the state pension system; and (v) restructuring public sector enterprises, including through closure, as needed.
name: DEVELOPING PUBLIC RESOURCE MANAGEMENT IN MIZORAM
